data.title: CDFA Announces Public Licensing Workshops for Cannabis Cultivators in March and April
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO, March 15, 2018 — The California Department of Food and Agriculture’s CalCannabis Cultivation Licensing Division will host seven public workshops throughout California starting on March 27.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control

og_meta.site_description: Learn about California cannabis laws and licenses
